review: Yes!!! It's one of the best thing I've ever bought..
author: Jose Torres

review: The only issue I have is when I stream Netflix, it bogs down sometimes and have a hard time watching something that is constantly blipping like that.  Also, it doesn't have a YouTube app.  Other than that I like the ease of use!
author: Julie Churchvara

review: Great product! Great price! You cannot go wrong with this! Just buy it!
author: Marduk666

review: This is hands down the best streaming stick on the market!
author: Reginal Allen

review: Easy to install and use, and I love the little remote control. What a pleasant surprise that it came with batteries and ready to use. I am enjoying the Fire TV Stick very much. A lot of binge watching!
author: CC_NOLA

review: Graet content and picture quality (for streaming). Sometimes takes 2 or 3 times to connect. Better instructions for solving refresh rate problems should be included.
author: Philip J Carbonaro
